name: Ext_R4B_ImagingStudy_modality
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ImagingStudy.modality for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ImagingStudy.modality from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImagingStudy|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: All series modality if actual acquisition modalities
element.definition: A list of all the series.modality values that are actual acquisition modalities, i.e. those in the DICOM Context Group 29 (value set OID 1.2.840.10008.6.1.19).
element.comment: `ImagingStudy.modality` maps to R5 `ImagingStudy.modality`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: All series modality if actual acquisition modalities
element.definition: A list of all the series.modality values that are actual acquisition modalities, i.e. those in the DICOM Context Group 29 (value set OID 1.2.840.10008.6.1.19).
element.comment: `ImagingStudy.modality` maps to R5 `ImagingStudy.modality`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Type of acquired data in the instance.
